title: Greg Gets Steam Deck, Loses His Mind

transcript_chunks.text: this is the energy i'm putting into the universe today i tweeted i'm feeling it this is my week i will get my email about my steam deck being ready i feel like that loves it now live everybody i'm gonna open up my steam deck email throw that open and i i'm not even making it up it's here it's here it is here there you go 16 minutes ago [ __ ] praise be to jesus whoever made this happen
